artist: Painter: After Gaspard Dughet; Engraver: Samuel William Reynolds I
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscriptions

below image in black: Painted by Gaspar Poussin   Engraved on Steel by S.W. Reynolds / engraver to the King / DISTANT VIEW OF ROME FROM TIVOLI  / From a Picture in the possession of Frederick Perkins, Esq'r / Gems of ... Art  | on sheet in pencil: 2-234
title: A Distant View of Rome from Tivoli
